Metadata.name: P3F Community Enhancement Pack
Metadata.author: P3F CEP Team
Metadata.description:
Every setup tool and essential mod for Persona 3 FES in one beginner-friendly pack. Compiled and maintained by Pixelguin.
Click on these section headers to learn more about each section.
The next time you see Tekka, tell him that he needs to add section header functionality to Aemulus :)
(Enabling/disabling headers won't do anything.)
